mapper.sql: t.ID, t.CULPRIT_ID, t.DIC_IS_ASK_LEAVE_KEY, t.DIC_IS_REGISTER_KEY, t.DIC_IS_LATE_KEY, t.INSPECTION_SUB_ID, t. DIC_CHECK_STATUS_KEY, t.NOTE, t.CREATED, t.CREATER, t.UPDATED, t.UPDATER, t.DEL_FLAG, (select t2.CHECK_START_TIME from SF_INSPECTION t2 left join SF_INSPECTION_SUB t3 on t2.id=t3.INSPECTION_ID where t3.id=t.INSPECTION_SUB_ID) checkStartTime, (select t2.CHECK_END_TIME from SF_INSPECTION t2 left join SF_INSPECTION_SUB t3 on t2.id=t3.INSPECTION_ID where t3.id=t.INSPECTION_SUB_ID) checkEndTime
mapper.select: select , c.name as "culprit_name", g.name as "group_name" from SF_INSPECTION_DEAL t left join sf_culprit c on c.id = t.culprit_id left join SF_INSPECTION_sub sis on sis.id = t.INSPECTION_SUB_ID left join sys_group g on g.id = sis.group_id where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.insert: insert into SF_INSPECTION_DEAL (ID, CULPRIT_ID, DIC_IS_ASK_LEAVE_KEY, DIC_IS_REGISTER_KEY, DIC_IS_LATE_KEY, INSPECTION_SUB_ID, DIC_CHECK_STATUS_KEY, NOTE, CREATED, CREATER, UPDATED, UPDATER, DEL_FLAG) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicIsAskLeaveKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicIsRegisterKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicIsLateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{inspectionSubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{dicCheckStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL})

insert into SF_INSPECTION_DEAL
ID,
CULPRIT_ID,
DIC_IS_ASK_LEAVE_KEY,
DIC_IS_REGISTER_KEY,
DIC_IS_LATE_KEY,
INSPECTION_SUB_ID,
DIC_CHECK_STATUS_KEY,
NOTE,
CREATED,
CREATER,
UPDATED,
UPDATER,
DEL_FLAG,

mapper.update:
update SF_INSPECTION_DEAL
CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_ASK_LEAVE_KEY = #{dicIsAskLeaveKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_REGISTER_KEY = #{dicIsRegisterKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_IS_LATE_KEY = #{dicIsLateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
INSPECTION_SUB_ID = #{inspectionSubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DIC_CHECK_STATUS_KEY = #{dicCheckStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

update SF_INSPECTION_DEAL set CULPRIT_ID = #{culpritId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_ASK_LEAVE_KEY = #{dicIsAskLeaveKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_REGISTER_KEY = #{dicIsRegisterKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_IS_LATE_KEY = #{dicIsLateKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, INSPECTION_SUB_ID = #{inspectionSubId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DIC_CHECK_STATUS_KEY = #{dicCheckStatusKey,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, NOTE = #{note,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CREATED = #{created,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, CREATER = #{creater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, UPDATED = #{updated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, UPDATER = #{updater,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, DEL_FLAG = #{delFlag,jdbcType=DECIMAL} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}
mapper.select:
select , c.name as "culprit_name", g.name as "group_name" from SF_INSPECTION_DEAL t left join sf_culprit c on c.id = t.culprit_id left join SF_INSPECTION_sub sis on sis.id = t.INSPECTION_SUB_ID left join sys_group g on g.id = sis.group_id
order by ${orderStr}
